title: News App
description: Built a responsive news app using React.js, fetching data from a third-party API to display real-time updates on sports, entertainment, and health. Implemented state management using React hooks

title: Inotebook
description: Created a responsive note-taking app using the MERN stack. Implemented secure login with JWT and added features for creating, editing, and deleting notes. Used React Context API for state management.

title: TicTacToe Game
description: Tic-Tac-Toe a classic paper-pencil game played between two players, typically using 3x3 grid, using HTML, CSS, Javascript.
